about_the_game:
King Fighter Xtreme is a chaotic, physics-driven rogue-lite RPG where you summon your own enemies and battle through endless hordes in a fight for survival. As a Crawler, you’ll use skill cards and weapons to face the dangers lurking beyond every dark portal.

Dive into unique battles where every choice matters—select from an array of powerful abilities, craft custom gear, and explore vast dungeons filled with enemies to defeat. Whether you prefer strategic combat or reckless mayhem, the dynamic combat system keeps you engaged with every encounter.

Customize your Crawler’s appearance, weapons, and abilities, allowing you to develop your own fighting style. Use powerful crafting materials to create devastating weapons like hammers, bows, and magical staves, or even summon enemies to challenge yourself further.

Test your skills in PvP arenas where you can battle other players or team up with friends to face the toughest enemies. Each crawl is different, making every playthrough a new and exciting experience in King Fighter Xtreme.

short_description: King Fighter Xtreme is a physics-based rogue-lite action RPG where you spawn enemies, customize your Crawler, and battle through hordes of foes. Dodge, fight, and craft powerful gear as you explore dungeons, upgrade skills, and challenge others in PvP arenas. Every crawl is unique!
